GEOLOCATION_PERMISSION_DENIED: Truy cập đã bị từ chối. Bạn đã phê duyệt ứng dụng để truy cập vị trí của bạn chưa?
GEOLOCATION_POSITION_UNAVAILABLE: Không thể xác định vị trí. Bạn đã kích hoạt GPS chưa?
GEOLOCATION_DESCRIPTION: Ứng dụng cần vị trí của bạn để ghép cặp với những người dùng xung quanh.
REQUESTS_EMPTY_DISCLAIMER_NEEDER: Gửi một yêu cầu và chúng tôi sẽ tìm những tình nguyện viên ở gần. Bạn sẽ nhận được thông báo khi có người nhận giúp đỡ.
REQUESTS_EMPTY_DISCLAIMER_HELPER: Cảm ơn bạn đã tham gia tình nguyện. Chúng tôi sẽ gửi thông báo khi có người cần giúp đỡ!
REQUESTS_REQUEST_PENDING_DETAILS_NEEDER: {{name}} đã gửi yêu cầu trợ giúp
REQUESTS_REQUEST_PENDING_DETAILS_HELPER: Bạn đã yêu cầu trợ giúp
REQUESTS_REQUEST_PENDING_CANCEL_CONFIRM_: Bạn có chắc muốn huỷ lệnh yêu cầu?
REQUESTS_REQUEST_ACCEPTED_DETAILS_HELPER: {{name}} đã đồng ý giúp đỡ bạn
REQUESTS_REQUEST_ACCEPTED_TITLE_NEEDER: {{name}} đã đồng ý giúp bạn! Hãy gọi hoặc nhắn tin cho bạn ấy! Không tiếp xúc trực tiếp cho sự an toàn của cả hai bên.
REQUESTS_REQUEST_ACCEPTED_TITLE_HELPER: Bạn đã đồng ý giúp {{name}} ! Hãy gọi hoặc nhắn tin cho bạn ấy! Không tiếp xúc trực tiếp cho sự an toàn của cả hai bên.
INTRO_TITLE: Thank you for making an impact
SIGNIN_TITLE: Please sign up with your favourite social login
CONSENTS_TITLE: I agree with the following statements at this moment and for any future use of the app
CONSENTS_SYMPTOMS: I am not showing any symptoms of COVID-19 (coughing, fever, shortness of breath, etc.).
CONSENTS_TRAVEL: I have not travelled out of the country in the past 14 days.
CONSENTS_CONTACT: I have not come in contact with anyone suspected of being infected or sick in the past 14 days.
CONSENTS_SOCIAL: I have been practising social distancing.
CONSENTS_CONFIRM: I confirm that I've read and agree to the terms of services and the privacy policy.
PROFILE_SETUP_TITLE: We just need a few things to set you up.
PROFILE_SETUP_HELPER_TITLE: Thank you for helping your local community.
PROFILE_SETUP_TERMS_CONFIRM: I have read and agree with the <0>terms of service</0>
PROFILE_SETUP_PRIVACY_POLICY_CONFIRM: I understand and consent to the collection and use of my personal information, including my Health Data, as described in the <0>privacy policy</0>
PROFILE_GROUP_TITLE: You're part of a volunteer group? Type your group password to get verified.
PROFILE_GROUP_ERROR: We couldn't find your group. Is the password correct?
PROFILE_NAME_TITLE: Please enter your first and last name
SPONSORS_REACH_OUT: Reach out if your company can help.
ONBOARDING_SAFETY_INSTRUCTIONS: Please comply with local laws and health and safety requirements.
ONBOARDING_HELPER_TEXT_1: When someone close to you needs help, you’ll receive a notification.
ONBOARDING_HELPER_TEXT_2: When you hit the “Accept” button, you will be matched with them.
ONBOARDING_HELPER_TEXT_3: You then call or text the person in need to understand what their request is.
ONBOARDING_HELPER_TEXT_4: If there is no request pending, we will send you a notification as soon as someone needs help.
ONBOARDING_NEEDER_TEXT_1: You can send out a request for help by pressing the “Request help button”.
ONBOARDING_NEEDER_TEXT_2: When someone accepts your request, you get a notification and their contact information.
ONBOARDING_NEEDER_TEXT_3: Call or text the volunteer to communicate your request.
ONBOARDING_NEEDER_TEXT_4: You can either send a request now or when you will need it.
